Text: RE FWThanks for the briefing We have your file here and I will add this information so we have a complete story Good luck with the GMAT and keep in contact Jennifer Jennifer Miller Interim Director of Admissions MBA program McCombs School of Business University of Texas at Austin Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October PM To Jennifer Miller Subject Re FW Jennifer Thank you for the response and the update The news that Dr Harris had left was news to me since I had not received an autoreply message Just to let you know Dr Harris and I had talked quite a bit last year about my application status I had also talked to many of the Finance Professors particularly Professor Sheridan Titman about the program and my application status Both Professor Titman and Dr Harris suggested that I take a finance class as well as retake the GMAT Due to my documented learning disability I am trying to receive a special testing status from GMAC and then retake the GMAT I hope this brief download of my previous conversations with Dr Harris and others at the Business School has helped I hope all is going well with the new school year and I look forward to hearing from you in the near future Regards Ben Rogers

FWRogers As you may have noticed from the autoreply to your email Dr Harris is no longer with the University of Texas I have taken the position of Interim Director until we find a permanent replacement While I do not know what conversations you have had with Dr Harris I can assure you that the steps you are taking to improve your application are the correct ones Congratulations on your class and I do hope that you get a positive response from GMAC regarding the GMAT exam I am glad to hear that you are still interested in our program and we look forward to receiving your new application Sincerely Jennifer Miller MBA Admissions McCombs School of Business University of Texas at Austin Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday October AM To Subject Re Dr Harris I hope you had an enjoyable summer and it did not go too quickly as I felt mine did I wanted to let you know that I am still very much interested in attending the Business School I took your advice this summer and took a graduate level finance class Financial Management which I received an A I was very pleased with myself because I had not taken this type of class in quite some time I have also decided to take another graduate level finance class Macroeconomics which I am currently taking I also sent my information regarding my learning disability into GMAC to try and receive a special testing status for the GMAT I am currently waiting to hear back from them with their decision When I hear back from GMAC I am planning on retaking the GMAT to try and increase my score As you can see I am still very much interested in attending the Business School for next year and Im in the process of doing whatever I can to increase my application profile Please let me know if there is anything else you think I need to do to enhance my application profile Again I hope all is going well and I look forward to hearing from you soon Regards Ben Rogers Associate Enron Corp
